attributes.action: Request the Queen to present a posthumous medal to PC Bill Barker
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In respect of the tragic loss of PC Bill Barker that he should be awarded a posthumous George Medal for his courage during the recent incident in Cumbria.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
